name: Two Moon: Space Rabbit
description:
Two Moon Is A Fast-paced Roguelike Game.

Story
The Earth you live on has suddenly become two moons.
As a representative of Earth, you arrive on the moon and see a building in front of you.
The game begins as you open the door to the building, determined to plant a bomb in its basement.
Game Setup
The game consists of 7 stages, with a vendor in front of you at the beginning where you can buy weapons or items.
After buying a weapon, doors will open and you'll have to go through each room to defeat the enemies.
As you defeat enemies, you can level up and increase your stats.
There are three stats in total: STR, DEX, and INT.
Weapons, Items
Weapons include swords, daggers, bows, guns, staves, and books, each dealing different amounts of damage based on the current protagonist's stats.
Once you get a weapon you like, you can enhance it to make it even better!
Weapons are also categorized into Basic, Rare, Unique, Demonic, and Legendary tiers.
As for items, there are offensive, defensive, recovery, and new abilities that are added when you get a set of items, so you may want to purchase them from time to time. If you don't like an item, you can reroll and choose another.
Some items or weapons are not available in the store.
Controls
Arrow keys to move, I to view stats and bags, Z to dash, C to talk and buy, and B to use skills (only a few weapons).

Take On A total Of 5 Bosses and Save the Planet!
